<title level="1" right="Focus 9" pfs="Standard">
[Unblinking Flame Ignition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1246)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 223

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Trigger** A foe reduces you to half your Hit Points or fewer.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 3 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

You feel the most alive when pushed into a corner, as the insights and vision granted by the flame stoke into overdrive. Your body begins to emit a blazing aura of flames. You gain [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416), and the ability to see [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) creatures. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed as you launch flame from your aura to soar through the sky. You become [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32), and you can use the extra action each round only to Strike or [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) using your flames. Any creature who starts their turn within 5 feet of you takes 1d12 fire damage.
name: Unblinking Flame Ignition
